body_html: @byronyi "Hybrid" means some of the nodes in the cluster are connected with Ethernet and others are with Infiniband. We have not found such a use case. If you think that's something interesting to you, feel free to extend the code.

body: @byronyi "Hybrid" means some of the nodes in the cluster are connected with Ethernet and others are with Infiniband. We have not found such a use case. If you think that's something interesting to you, feel free to extend the code.
